item.title: ShellMamu, Shell Utility Tool
item.description: ShellMamu is a small utility/helper tool for shell scripting language. It offers some utility commands which I used frequently in my work. The main purpose of shellMamu is to easily provide the needed parameters for a command. This document is a brief primer on using shellMamu. Please visit the github page for more details. Background I’ve been using small shell/unix commands for various purpose in Mac’s terminal for years.
